New Records: Pakistan recorded the highest successful run chase in Cricket World Cup history.
Key Match Events: Mohammad Rizwan scored 131 not out from 121 balls.
Abdullah Shafique scored 113 runs off 103 balls.
Kusal Mendis scored 122 runs from 65 balls.
Sadeera Samarawickrama scored 108 runs from 82 balls.
Dilshan Madushanka dismissed Imam-ul-Haq and Babar Azam early in the innings.
